players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso and I investigated him. He knows I'm the detective now."

You: "
"
Charlie: "I am innocent and need proof"
Diana: "I am the detective and have evidence that Bob is the mafioso. I will continue to investigate and protect the villagers."
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice last night. I will continue to protect my own."
Charlie: "I am innocent and need proof. Can you show me the evidence against Bob?"
